message: Let's end this quickly. A generous offer for you, Bob!
Fair is fair. Let's split it evenly.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. Time is money, and it's losing value fast!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats up all the profit!
This is my final offer.  Time is running out, and inflation is hurting us both.
